key.name: usage-mode
key.description: The usage mode chosen will affect the Window Management behaviour.

key.name: edge-barrier-sensitivity
key.summary: Sensitivity of screen edge barriers for the mouse pointer.
key.description: Some UI actions like revealing the launcher or the applications spread are triggered by pushing the mouse pointer against a screen edge. This key defines how much you have to push in order to trigger the associated action.

key.name: edge-barrier-min-push
key.summary: Minimum push needed to overcome edge barrier
key.description: How much you have to push (in grid units)the mouse against an edge barrier when sensibility is 100.

key.name: edge-barrier-max-push
key.summary: Maximum push needed to overcome edge barrier
key.description: How much you have to push (in grid units) the mouse against an edge barrier when sensibility is 1.

key.name: edge-drag-width
key.summary: The width of the edge drag areas
key.description: How big (in grid units) the edge-drag sensitive area should be.

key.name: autohide-launcher
key.description: This will only be applied in windowed mode. In staged mode, the launcher will always hide.

key.name: launcher-width
key.summary: Width of the launcher in grid units.
key.description: Changes the width of the launcher in all usage modes.

key.name: enable-indicator-menu
key.summary: Enable or disable the indicator pull down menus
key.description: Toggle the availability of the indicator pull down menus

key.name: appstore-uri
key.summary: The uri to the app store
key.description: This will be used whenever the user triggers an action to open the app store.

key.name: always-show-osk
key.description: Toggle the visibility of the On Screen Keyboard unconditionally

key.name: osk-switch-visible
key.summary: Whether the OSK switch should be visible
key.description: Toggle the visibility of the OSK switch

key.name: locked-out-time
key.summary: When the greeter was last locked.
key.description: If too many unsuccessful login attempts have been made in a row, the greeter locks you out for a while. This unix timestamp indicates when you were locked out, so unity8 knows when to let you back in.

key.name: charging-state-visible
key.summary: Whether the battery charging state should be shown using the notification led
key.description: Toggle the visibility of the battery charging state in the notification led patterns
